Reviews.Content: Just what I expected. Takes nice cuality pictures. Makes me remember " you press the bottom we do the rest".Sometimes y mess with the software but then i manage to put settings back to original sets.

Reviews.Title: Overall a good camera
Reviews.Author: carol beza
Reviews.Content: To a point I have enjoyed my Nikon Coolpix L110, I do enjoy getting out an taking pictures.  As the other reviews, it does take getting used to different settings in different light, an I agree, when something is happening quick, you do not have time to adjust all the settings.  My son in law took it to Africa while on vacation, an overall he enjoyed it, but he did not get as clear a pic on some spots, like lions in bushes an etc as while in a moving vehicle an even stopped for a moment, you do not have time to sit an adjust to a different setting when action is happening at the moment.My own biggest problems is that sometimes when I turn it on an start to take a pic, The shutter clicks as if to take the pic, an so you begin to move cam away, an then you hear a separate click, an which I look at picture, it seems that the second click is the pic you get an even if I stand there it comes out blurry :(  that is a big appointment. I have had it also freeze on me for no reason while taking pictures, I end up having to open the battery compartment to get it to turn off an unfreeze. I was excited to purchase this camera at first, now I am finding that I will have to most likely take to a camera shop to see what the problem actually is, an may find myself saving yet again for a better one...

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Wesley Stark
Reviews.Content: This camera has a gift for a friend in Belarus. There, he makes great pictures and send them to me. Device works very well, the pictures are beautiful, it is convenient to use.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: J. Walker
Reviews.Content: Very good, excellent quality pictures, with stereo surround sound, 720p HD video. Awesome long range shots. If you aren't looking to spend a ton of money, and still want a great camera, this is the line to buy.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter to upgrade and replace her previous camera. She loves using it, loves the features and I use it to take action shots when my kids play baseball and softball. I love being able to take continual shots so I don't miss any action. Fair price for the features.

Reviews.Title: L110 is a good choice.
Reviews.Author: farice
Reviews.Content: The Nikon L110 is a very good and easy to use camera. It will take some abuse and I use it in some dusty comditions much of the time. If it only had a sun hood that could be attached it would be great.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Savannah's Mom
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon coolpix because I wanted a step above my point and shoot camera yet not ready for a DSLR. This is perfect for the novice. Although it has less MP than the current model, the pictures are crisp and clear. I am so glad that I purchased this and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good camera bad deal
Reviews.Author: K. Carter
Reviews.Content: this is my 2nd nikon l110 but my first time from seller. the camera works fine and is "like" new. but all i got was the camera. no sholder strap no lens cover. no instructions. nothing that comes in the box. my first nikon l110 i got for $25 less and it had everything and the original box.

Reviews.Title: Modestly priced and reliable.  Good for non-professional use
Reviews.Author: Daniel Wakelin
Reviews.Content: Good little camera.  I probably should have spent more money and got an SLR, but for the few times I use a camera, it is just fine.

Reviews.Title: Good Product. As expected. No compains. If you compare prices and is the best, there is no hold back to it.
Reviews.Author: MARCOS Y YOSIDA
Reviews.Content: Good Product. As expected. No compains. If you compare prices and is the best, there is no hold back to it.

Reviews.Title: It is okay
Reviews.Author: Busy Mom
Reviews.Content: It looks great, and I think the red color got me more then anything else. Takes nice pictures outside but inside at sporting events the pictures didn't come out that great at all which was the main purpose for this camera for me. Videos are actually pretty good. ALso pictures inside at kids concerts don't come out very good either. Was hoping I could get some good inside pictures with this, but does take good outside pictures.

Reviews.Title: Red Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Smith "MAS"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it! Being red doesn't hurt either. Pictures are crisp . The only negative could be how quickly the camera goes through batteries.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: R. Stoecklein
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  It does everything I need it to do.  The quality of the photos is great.  It is easy to use also.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: KD
Reviews.Content: I love my camera.  Love that it runs on regular batteries and the pictures are soooo great.  You just have to remember to take it on trips when you go.  We are so used to our phones taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Nelda Neal
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves it.  Takes great pictures.  great on Christmas morning.  Very lightweight to carry.  She picked it from many  others.

Reviews.Title: Grainy Pictures - Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because of the zoom and the sport option so I caould take pictures of my son's sporting events.  The pictures are TERRIBLE. They all come out grainy.  The only pictures from this camera that come out well are if you are taking a fairly close group shot with perfect lighting.  I would not recommend this camera.  My iPhone takes better photos and video.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Husband LOVES
Reviews.Author: Lady Morningstar
Reviews.Content: Husband has enjoyed using his camera.  Likes the closeness that he is able to get to his objects, and the clearness

Reviews.Title: Good, not great, camera.
Reviews.Author: M. Baker
Reviews.Content: The pictures appear to be out of focus, could be caused by my tremor. My older Nikon took better pictures.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: dill pickles
Reviews.Content: This is an awsome camera, i seriously bring it every were, and it carries hundred's of pictures, a must buy item.

Reviews.Title: REPLACED OLDER COOLPIX WITH THIS & AM NOT HAPPY.
Reviews.Author: L. Sims
Reviews.Content: Indoor pics are not clear & I'm still working to see if I can overcome that. Other Nikon was older & starting to act up so I replaced it with this - not good. From now on I'm not buying a camera that someone else hasn't used so I can see the results.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictres
Reviews.Author: H. Lloyd Parrish "lpar"
Reviews.Content: Arrived earlier than expected.  I found it easy to get started taking pictures and excellant quality for such an inexpensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the $$$!
Reviews.Author: Larry Wahler "Grand Prix Lover!"
Reviews.Content: Use this camera Daily and love how it works for the cost! Would like it if it had a few more functions, but this is a great camera for someone not ready for an SLR but beyond a flat Point & Shoot!

Reviews.Title: I recommend purchasing the Energizer CHP4WBR Recharg Smart AA/AAA  Charger with 4AA NIMNH to go with this!!
Reviews.Author: AT&T customer
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase. As stated above the recharable batteries are a must have.  The camera takes terrific pics! The only part I don't like much is opening the flash. I wish it could be smarter than me & open itself when it's needed......

Reviews.Title: Satisified customer
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I found some discrepancy with the camera upon receiving the camera. 10 mp vs. 12.2mp deep scratches on viewing lens ect. I feel that that seller did not know of this error in sending me the camera. I have cancer and needed to documents my condition for the VA. With a camera.  After giving my rating the seller contacted me via email and the seller did all they could to please me and to make the situation right. I would highly recommend the seller to all for the courteous  way this seller made it a win-win situation

Reviews.Title: Damage item
Reviews.Author: Bertha A. Astor "B."
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time, but defective and damage. I must think that this product (Camera) is a good camera, but on this case the product I purchased does not work properly.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: penname
Reviews.Content: Takes very clear pictures while in motion as long as it is in auto or continuous sports mode. The picture quality is high, and the zoom is incredible!  Very good purchase for a buyer on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: jpatten
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera!  It takes clear and vivid color pictures with ease.  The zoom function works great and I can see items clearly from a good distance away. It is great for shooting small movies at dance recitals or at a baseball game. I like the fact that I can crop pictures from the screen and save them. It is light weight and not too chunkey to pack around all day. I really love this camera!

Reviews.Title: The great Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Caleb
Reviews.Content: This camera is Great., i am very happy,good image, good video, good weigth ., nice camera for my. I am pleased to have her.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: rockambo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this used camera as a Xmas present for my wife.  It came in great condition and works well.  The camera takes good photos even with flash.  She's very happy, therefore I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ramona Thomas-scott
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this product.  My husband was thrilled to receive this as a gift and looks forward to many years to great picture-taking.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: scott2132
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera to start a new hobby.  I have no real photography experience.  I received my used Nikon Coolpix L110 and I couldn't be happier with my first impression.  The camera was provided in a timely manner and works perfectly.  As it was described, there are a couple of minor spots indicative of prior use.  These are so minor I only mention them because the camera was so well disclosed.  Everything was provided in the original box with CD, strap,cords and manuals. I even got the batteries. LOL

Reviews.Title: not really satisfied..
Reviews.Author: yeng
Reviews.Content: at first I thought this camera is cool. but then when I tried to use it, the pictures are blurred, its not that clear. I tried to use the other features but still some pictures came out blurred. And when I used the zoom feature,they came out not too good. My other digital camera which I thought I can discard after I buy this NIKON coolpix L110, I think takes better pictures. I am, soo disappointed...My Samsung Infuse mobile phone takes better pics than this too...

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: vanclan
Reviews.Content: I received the camera for Christmas and have been taking videos and pictures since. The pictures turn out very good, but indoors you do need to use the flash or the colors come out weird. The video is good, but sounds aren't very loud. I have been using the standard settings. I haven't figured out yet how to do action pictures without getting blurry, but I guess it would help if I would read the rest of the manual.  All in all it is a good camera with lots of features.

Reviews.Title: not bad!
Reviews.Author: electronics guy
Reviews.Content: Got this a few weeks ago, refurb from bh photo 159 and overall its a great camera. the video is the only weak point, it works but if you zoom while recoding goes out of focus until you stop, the pictures are great. just take a few minutes to go over the settings or you can leave it in auto. overall i dont think you can find a better cam for 159, picture quality is great and options/controls great ! no regrets!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix L-110
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: A great camera. If you are wanting an easy to use camera with a little more to offer than a compact digital, this is a great one.  Superb photos, outstanding clarity.  Sharp focusing.  Easy to replace batteries.  Not too technical, yet advanced enough for great pictures. Wonderful ergonomics. Easy to navigate through the menu.  For my needs, this is a perfect fit. If you want easy but compact, maybe not the camera for you.  If you want advanced photo options, maybe not the camera for you.  If you are in between, this one can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, love it!
Reviews.Author: Bernie65
Reviews.Content: I have wanted this camera for the last year and half. Been waiting till I had the money. I got it for a special trip and was not dissapointed. It took great pictures indoors and out. I loved the special museum setting, just perfect!The smile finder is great. I have not learned to use the video yet but will soon. Thanks for a great experience on my first quality camera.

Reviews.Title: NOT A PRO BUT.......
Reviews.Author: NOT A PRO OK
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA! EASE OF USE EVEN WITHOUT MANUAL! SUPER SHOTS! SUPER DUPER CLOSE UP AND REGULAR! HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I SAY ITS THE CADILLAC OF CAMERAS. NIKON IS INCREDIBLE. I HAVE 5 CAMERAS. THEY DO ABOUT THE SAME THING. I AM SELLING MY OTHERS. THE NIKON IS INCREDIBLE!I THOUGHT MY DAD WAS A NAME ADDICT HE LOVES NIKON MINOLTA PENTAX... NOW I SEE WHY. I TRIED SEVERAL OF SAME TYPE OF CAMERA AND THE NIKON IS SWEET!I KEEP THIS NIKON THE OTHERS ARE FOR SALE! YOU CAN SET IT TO AUTO FOCUS AND WHEN YOU ZOOM OR GET READY TO SHOOT IT AUTO FOCUS BEFORE YOU CLICK! VERY FAST NO FOOLING AROUND TO TAKE A PICTURE! TRY IT YOU LIKE IT...HEY AGAIN I AM NO PRO ...BUT THIS ONE IS SWEET! MY FUJI IS TOO MUCH FOOLING AROUND AND SET UP TO TAKE A PICTURE,MY SONY USES TOO MUCH BATTERY WHEN ZOOMING,MY OTHER NIKON IS TOO SIMPLE TO TAKE SHAKE FREE PICTURES AND CANT BLOW UP BIG PICS WITH. THIS ONE IS SWEET! PERFECT FOR ME. I SHOOT INCREDIBLE CLOSE UPS FOR MY WEB SITE JEWELRY, LANDSCAPES, CARS, PEOPLE, ...TOO SWEET!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: malonso
Reviews.Content: Excellent videos. If you like to take multiple photos and want to take pictures if you are moving....dont buy it! most of them will bee blurry. You need to work with this camera and it will reward you handsomely....but it will take time to get use to camera's own rythm.

Reviews.Title: for the $$$ this is the best camera
Reviews.Author: ANGIE
Reviews.Content: There is nothing I have not been able to do with this camera.  I am not an expert and have no trouble using it at all.  I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Handle settings
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: Can not handle manually focus and exposure settings. and some other parameters. all come and prerecorded. but very good quality product

Reviews.Title: Great optical zoom
Reviews.Author: S. Millegan "SGM MoM"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the optical zoom and quality of indoor shots.  It has met every expectation.  :-)  I did not check the movie capability.  Overall I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Mehhhh....
Reviews.Author: J. Frey "Sfrey1"
Reviews.Content: Well, I have been working with this camera for 6 months now. I love the zoom function and the quick shutter. However, I have a real problem with the quality of my photos. Most of them have this washed out/grainy look to them. The colors are not vibrant. I am not a pro by any means, and I have read through most of the user manual, but I can not get this problem under control. I have a cheap little Sony camera that takes better quality photos. So, I feel a bit disappointed. Maybe its just user error and I am a big dummy. But I only have a few good pics of my family with this new "nice" camera.If someone knows the solution to my problem, I'd love some advice. If you could just add a comment, I'd be very grateful.Overall, 3 stars. I was hoping for better quality.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dorothys grandmother
Reviews.Content: Loved it!!!!!  Best camera I have ever had. I get a lot of compliments.  Thank you  C.Payne

Reviews.Title: flash
Reviews.Author: hiv0ltg
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures for the price.Con: The flash has to be manually lifted in order for it to go off.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L110
Reviews.Author: Jogesh N. Parekh
Reviews.Content: Very nice Camera in reasonable price from Amazon.com. I have Kodak camera but 12 Mp Kodak camera giving very bad picture quality. So I decided to buy brand name camera and I feel its worthy money and quality wise.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: uvsec
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Pictures turn out wonderful. Easy to use....view is large and great to see what you have taken.  Zoom is still clear and sharp!  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: given as a gift
Reviews.Author: JAK Noir
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera as a gift to my best friend and he loved it still speechless about it but he has managed to say he loves the picture quality and the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Not bad... not perfect!
Reviews.Author: GreenC5910
Reviews.Content: We were shopping for a new camera because our old point and shoot just wasn't cutting it with a new baby around!  We bought this camera and we are for the most part happy.  I will go over the pros and cons below:Pros:-Takes a pretty fast picture.. not instant but not nearly as slow as most point and shoots.- Not overly large- Is fairly easy to operate- is durable- Video sound and quality is pretty good.Cons:- The flash is VERY bright and can sometimes wash out our pictures.- If you put this in a carry case it becomes very bulky- It uses ion batteries instead of a rechargeable one.  We personally find this annoying and expensive.- If you put it on auto and take pictures without the flash up (even if you dont need it) the shots come out blurry.Overall we are pretty happy with the camera.  We bought it when it first came out so it was a bit more expensive, but still not as much (or as complicated) as an SLR.  If you are looking to catch your kids in quick shots.. it works pretty well for us!

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: originallegion
Reviews.Content: Great item, I knew it would be superb. Quality and HD recording is absolutely phenomonal. Only problem is the sound quality isn't as great, but what for you expect when you buy a camera and not a camcorder.  Nonetheless its a great item.

Reviews.Title: Point & Shoot
Reviews.Author: Photo taker
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a larger size point and shoot camera, then this is the camera for you.  It is very basic with preconfigured scences, and lots of them.  Video button easily accessable for recording.  There is exposure composition but there are no other manual exposure controls.  My least favorite thing is the flash doesn't pop up automatically.  The camera will indicate the flash is needed and you will have to manually pull up the flash....but this is a simple basic camera for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: #1mom
Reviews.Content: By reading other peoples reviews I decided on this camera bc thie price was in my range,and the zoom was what caught my attention. I've had this camera for a month now and I'm still finding out new things. the only thing I dislike is when you press the button to take the picture the pictures come out blury. The setting I use is portiat and close up mainly. And they turn out fine. I am a canan only but took a chance on nikon and i dont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: gabby
Reviews.Content: I love the Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red) it takes great pictures and videos.I got the camera to take pictures of my sons sporting events and to capture family and friends moments. I would have liked it to come with a rechargeable battery but we can always buy the rechargeable double AA's. I would recommend this camera to people that are wanting to have professional quality pictures for the unprofessional photographer.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: The camera was a super great value compared to any store prices we compared.  My daughter loves the camera. We just took it to Costa Rica on a trip and it was used constantly.  Batteries have good life also.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera : Good pix, good price
Reviews.Author: jeanee t
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that would take good close-up shots and still have good zoom quality. This camera meets my expectations. I have not tried the video capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Rox
Reviews.Content: It took us a little bit to get the hang of taking pictures with such a great camera. You can point and shoot, or go manual if you like.  We love this camera and are learning newer features every time we use it!  It's a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: lindsey burns
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure at first about buying another camera online since the last one wasn't what i thought.. But this camera  is awesome. My kids play baseball and I am able to take close up pictures of them while they are on the field. This was the best gift i bought for myself. The quality of the pictures are good too.!! This is an amazing camera and you won't regret buying it!!

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: pame
Reviews.Content: I wish it had a better stability function. I have a hard time making it stay steady. That  should be on the next modle

Reviews.Title: great if you don't have the budget for a dslr
Reviews.Author: MLHS
Reviews.Content: I bought this to tide me over until I can afford a Canon digital rebel and I might buy a Nikon now instead! Clear crisp photos as long as you have the right light. A little noise with low light and the videos isn't perfect, but if you want perfect video why use your point and shoot? GREAT for portraits!!!!! but don't forget to turn off the image stabilization if you are using a tripod! This camera feels great in your hand and is easy to use and even though there isn't a manual setting, you can change some of the auto settings, the rest you can do in photoshop anyways.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: tractormom
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera. Would highly recommend. I had one just like it before and it was stolen, so when I was ready to buy another one I bought one just like the one I had. I could not be happier!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110 review
Reviews.Author: B. Sears
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty good for the money.  I got it on sale here for just under $200 and was fairly impressed with it.  I am still learning what all of the "modes" are and what the camera will do but I am pleasantly surprised.Things I love about this camera is AA batteries, point and shoot with ease, LOVE LOVE LOVE the sports mode on it!Things I don't love - some of my pictures are blurry.If you don't have $700 - $1000 for a camera but can afford this one at $200 it would be the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Darrel Phillips
Reviews.Content: Nikon make great cameras and this one is no execption. MY wife is a Filipina and if you know anything about them you know what I mean when I say she give this camera a work out. SHe loves it and uses it constantly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome !
Reviews.Author: MWatkins
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera I am still learning how to use all the gadgets it has but so far I love it, it takes clear nice pictures, this morning I took pictures of the the snowy mountains as a close up they came out amazing. I love this camera !!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon L110
Reviews.Author: showmom
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a novice user! We are very happy with the quality of photos and videos.  It took a little while for us to get the settings right for what we wanted to photograph, but once we got used to it, the camera has been great!

Reviews.Title: Really good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: vick bhakta
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a present to my brother who is a avid photographer. He love this camera and enjoying it very much

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix L110
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it much yet, I purchased it for my trip to Italy in a months time. So far, I like it. The menu is a little difficult to manage, and wish there was one button just for type of picture I want to take. I hope after using more, I will have learned the correct sequence to access the menu. The zoom works great, and have a couple close shots that look clear and sharp. Also the battery door is a little difficult to snap shut.

Reviews.Title: 1st Digital
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, bought at the last minute for a 3 week trip to Mexico. Worked flawlessly and the pictures seem very high quality. Uses 4 AA batteries and they are still working after over 700 pictures, viewing, downloading, etc. Wasn't sure I would like not having a viewfinder but the screen is very easy to see, even in high light situations. Still have not figured how to make the flash work. Maybe I need to read the book. Even still, the indoor pics I took came out very nice. I am very pleased with my new camera.

Reviews.Title: Takes some getting used to
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Long
Reviews.Content: We've had to play with the camer a lot to figure out which settings are best for different situations. It's great outdoors, but we still can't get good indoor (low light) photos. I love the video and zoom! I don't like the Continuous Sports setting. Our kids are involved in several activities and this setting doesn't give us very good action shots indoors.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: JJHopper
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use to take pictures of my kids and things. The camera works great The pictures are very clear and if you read the directions and work with the camera you can to learn to use it right. I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy Howell "Cindy Howell"
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with our camera and it is so simple to use.  It is also very light and I can carry it in my purse.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great value for money
Reviews.Author: Electronics
Reviews.Content: Great value for money. The cam is pretty good and easy to use. The only con worth mentioning is that the image blurs at max or close to max optical Zoom. Other than that a gr8 buy.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: name pen
Reviews.Content: nice camera.  works well for my 14 year old daughter.  price was very affordable and glad i purchased it.  Came in time over the holiday break and i was impressed by the that.  Consumer reports saaid it was a good buy and so far it is.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: ate8atie8
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a Christmas gift for my wife due to the fact that mine was "accidentally" destroyed.  She loves in and it takes great pictures.. the only downfall is that it was a little confusing to figure out.All in all it is a good camera for a very affordable price!

Reviews.Title: best camera for the money
Reviews.Author: gingersnapp
Reviews.Content: Our old Kodak wasn't keeping up with our boys on the ball field, and we didn't have the money for a top of the line (or bottom of the line, for that matter) DSLR. I think this camera is the next best thing. The Nikon L110 meets our needs for sports shots and everyday picture-taking. I highly recommend reading the instructions and taking time to play with different picture settings because this camera has a lot to offer, especially if you're upgrading from a camera with few features. Judging by the pictures posted by others with this camera, I've only scratched the surface of what this camera can do.

Reviews.Title: Using The Nikon Coolpix L110
Reviews.Author: Pards Valley
Reviews.Content: This camera is a step above just point and shoot. I really wanted to replace the HP we have been using for some time as it did the job we needed and truly was point and shoot. However, that model is no longer available, so, knowing Nikon for many years decided to give it a go. We will eventually understand this one I'm sure, in the mean time the photos that are pretty bad we will delete and try-try-try again!! lolOne reason I chose this Camera is:It uses double 'A' batteries. Most Cameras are using Propriatary Batteries today which are costly and certainly not available at your local market if you need one.

Reviews.Title: she loves it
Reviews.Author: pushkins "pushkins"
Reviews.Content: we got this as a gift for a high school senior who needs her own camera for college.  she takes a lot of portrait-style pictures of the children she babysits.  we have been very pleased with this camera.  she has had NO difficulty learning to use it and the quality of the product is very good.only complaint, and it is really just a quibble, is that it didn't come with any kind of case whatsoever. Not even a cheapie one.  So we had to go out and get a case right away, which if we had realized that we would have ordered one with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Blurry images
Reviews.Author: seth
Reviews.Content: Sounds like their are a lot of people having the same problems with constant blurry pictures. I'm taking it back to the store. Also Nikon customer support sucks. They just give you the run around.

Reviews.Title: Best Video Quality and Good Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Sudhakar Kottapalli "sudha"
Reviews.Content: The camera is good for video recording at 720P. It is also has many options for taking pictures.Pros1. Best video quality2. Build Quality3. Features and OptionsCons1. Image Stabilization is not good with auto options2. Flash takes 2 to 3 secs to charge

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: BIG
Reviews.Content: Not much to say really. This camera takes great pictures and is easy to use. It has plenty of capture modes to play with or the easy mode to just point and shoot. It also looks great the red is different and eye catching. Your not gonna mistake your camera for another and I've had many nice comments on how cool the color is. We love it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110
Reviews.Author: BethMann24
Reviews.Content: I absolutley love this camera. It functions as a compact camera as well as professional grade. The price is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Unfulfilled Promises!
Reviews.Author: Jamie L. White "fiction addict"
Reviews.Content: I immediately tried "Easy Auto Mode" to see if this camera lived up to its promise. My approach is generally to first see what a camera will do without utilizing "bells and whistles", especially when the manufacturer highlights the competency of the easy mode. Although the LCD screen was clear and bright, as soon as I zoomed at all, the image on the screen became blurry. Sometimes it would clear up quickly; other times not at all. For that reason I returned the Nikon Coolpix L110.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coopix L110
Reviews.Author: egmp
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, simple features and still powerful for this model. I like the close-up feature the most. Satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Very handy and good shape camera, high technology even though is not a new model.  It had a frozen moment at the very first use while taking video; I hope it won't repeat again.  Just in case I bought extended warranty for 2 years.

Reviews.Title: great everyday camera
Reviews.Author: beek
Reviews.Content: I haven't used this camera much yet, but so far it is great for wildlife, portraits, landscapes, etc.  You must be very careful to gently squeeze the shutter button when using the zoom, because the slightest jolt will give a blurry picture.  I took several pictures at full zoom without a tripod, and most were very clear.  The camera is very easy to use, especially after reading the booklet.  It is well worth the money for all casual picture taking.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Ravacade
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase and the price was the best considering all the different stores selling this model.  It is very easy to use and I am able to pick up the camera and start shooting.  It does well in low light conditions.  I rarely use the flash but it's there if needed.

Reviews.Title: it's worth every pennie
Reviews.Author: E. Gavidia "Eddie"
Reviews.Content: This is so far one of the best cameras i've ever had, and believe me I've had a lot of cameras. The print quality it's very good, as well as the pictures.  The video it's not that great but it's a picture camera not a video one even though it has that capability.The only thing I don't like about this item, it's that when taking pictures in motion the quality goes down tremendously.  This probably will become a bigger problem if you have kids that play some sort of sport, like I do.

Reviews.Title: Not So User Friendly
Reviews.Author: B0dawso
Reviews.Content: The camera us a good deal when it comes to price but there are several quirks. The Auto mode on mine doesn't take very hood pictures. It doesnt adjust to light changes very well. Video quality is poor.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: bigskyson
Reviews.Content: A few years ago, I found  myself in need of a camera, so I rushed out and bought a 12 megapixel Sony Cybershot.  I was extremely disappointed. I almost celebrated after it was stolen. If there was any movement the shots were blurry and distorted, not to mention and the zoom was non-existent. I did alot of research before selecting this camera and I am glad I did. The zoom and picture quality are great, especially for the price. And it is very user friendly. It is a little bigger and heavier than most cameras in this price range, but if you value quality pictures, it's more than worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Tsvetelina Tomyim
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera was selling at, it's a good value. Makes good pictures, video could be a little sharper. Simplified use, can use more setting options, but it's a good camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Not a Nikon quality product.
Reviews.Author: Gwyndyr
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these at a local camera shop and it is junk.  It does zoom great however, focus is not really possible.  Out of 60 pictures both in and outdoors, 2 of them were of descent quality and they were both outside.  I have owned several products by Nikon and loved them all.. save this one.  I have returned it and am buying one of Nikon's smaller models.  One with cmos sensor.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Abilio Mancuello "Abilio"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for hobbists like me. It has some issue when using the 15x zoom. The images tempt to be a little blurry, but for normal shots this product is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Dave B
Reviews.Content: Pros* 12.1 M* Records 720p HD videos (29 consecutive minutes and up to 7 hours)* Light* 15x zoom* 3.0 Inch LCD display* Semi-Portable* Energizer Ultimate Lithium AA batteries last long about 8-9 hours(camera needs to be in power safe mode)* Value for the moneyCons* Continuous mode decreases the image quality to 3M* Only 20 consecutive pictures at a rapid 11.1, (2.5 seconds aprox, of stop motion capture at the time)* ISO 3200 and 6400 are available only for image sizes of 3M* No video light, reduces the image quality at night* Without the flash open, Nikon L110 will never capture fast-moving photos, only blurry images.* Not a reflect camera as Nikon P100* Need to buy Energizer Ultimate Lithium AA batteriesNOTE: Without at least a 8G flash card, Nikon L110 won`t store HD videos neither too many photos. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO BUY THE FLASH CARD

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Don Clifton
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this would be a nice upgrade for my wife . Picture quality is just OK in my opinion.I have several NIKON products and generally like them . This really just seems to be a point and shoot with options. Not bad ,not great.

Reviews.Title: Great middle of the road camera!
Reviews.Author: Lora A. Shiman "las"
Reviews.Content: Took a step up from a little point and shoot and am very happy with the L110.  It is light and small enough to carry with you. Photo and video quality are very good.  If you are looking in this price range, go for it! You will love it.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Plemons
Reviews.Content: very happy with camera, excellent condition arriving, all I could hope for and a good price too.  Matched the local black friday sales for that weekend Yea!

Reviews.Title: review of camera
Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed in the amount of internal memory.  I took the camera away with me and found out it would only hold 11 pictures.  I think I could of changed a setting, but didn't learn about that until I came home.  I had planned on buy more internal memory, I just felt that the camera should have come with more.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L110 A very good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jane R. Kaufman
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on a trip out of the country. It performed well but halfway thru the trip it wouldn't read my memory card.  I returned the camera when I arrived home with no hassle and got the same model.  It has performed very well.  I like the quality of the picture and appreciate various settings available for different lighting/event situations.  It's a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Enthu Amazon Buyer
Reviews.Content: I found this camera to be the best of the lot for the price.Zoom is sufficient for routine photography. Picture quality and resolutions is excellent. Camera also has useful features and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: good but no SLR
Reviews.Author: Kathy Dowden "photokat"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's birthday. She really likes the camera. The only thing that I don't like is there is no eye piece, you look at the screen. Too many chances for shakey pictures and focus problems. I love my slr camera, but she would never a slr camera to it's potential.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for the price
Reviews.Author: 4.6L_E.z
Reviews.Content: Really Good Camera im no expert but i love the cam takes nice fast shots. I take pictures of cars and at 12 megapixel they come out great. nice colors the Hd Recording i would say not the best but i guess better then your normal 480i.While recording on lcd looks steady but when its on the big picture its too shakyOver all Great Camera for the price i would say. Next is SLR :D!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration..
Reviews.Author: Sergio Bautista
Reviews.Content: saludos ya me fue entregado como lo ofrecido . esta Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration.. es exelente

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nicole L Podio
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera, would recommend for everyone. Excellent picture quality, lots of features.

Reviews.Title: coolpics with Nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Quintessential "Bargain Diva"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to upgrade my Kodak camera which began to take much to long to focus after zooming in on a subject.  So far Nikon is doing a better job.  The pictures are crisp and clean even when zooming in.  The only draw back is that this camera has no manual setting (which I knew prior to purchasing)..It's a point and shot camera that does not give you the opportunity to grow and learn.  That's fine if that's all you need and want.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: KS Infinite
Reviews.Content: I recommend this camera to anyone interested in the ease of taking photos or the joy of a memorable home video.  This is the first camera I've owned and I don't regret a penny of it.  I've used many other cameras and none has compared to the quality of this one.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Have used this camera several times and it works easy and picture quality is great so far.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: Being an amature this camera is wonderful.  There are many of the functions I still have to learn but I am very anxious.  It took wonderful pictures right out of the box - after the batteries were install of course.  I am looking forward to getting to know it better while on vacation.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Woolridge
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to very dear friends.  They love it with one exception: they are having difficulty downloading the video to an iMac.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1 MP Zoom
Reviews.Author: P. Johnson "User"
Reviews.Content: Nice for Macro and medium zoom shots. The long zoom seems blurry most of the time. Could be that the light weight makes the thing hard to hold steady. My older Sony H1 8MP 10x zoom is much better on the long shots. Shutter seems slow. I like the flash, really lights up a room, and the manual flip-up is great. It is a keeper at the AMZ price ($229). Have paid 10 times this for Canon DSLR lenses. Point being, for a walk-around picture taker at a car show, picnic, whatever, this fills my needs.

Reviews.Title: i love this camera
Reviews.Author: G. Hosack
Reviews.Content: This camera takes really good pictures no photogaphy expertise needed  pics come out wonderfully clear zoom is great

Reviews.Title: Nice zoom, display
Reviews.Author: Santhosh Bhat
Reviews.Content: Was my first ever digital camera, and I bought it after lot of searching. If you are going for more optical zoom then this camera may please you.Motion image capturing of this cam is not so good, it produces blurred image. Overall, nice cam and I am happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money, zoom is so so
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to use and the sports option allows for 13 shots per second so you don't miss anything.  The sports option only records at 3 megapixels though zoomed-in detail is absent.  If you shoot any distance sports (football, soccer, etc. the use of the software to zoom in renders some grainy views even before you fully get to the end of the optical zoom (and then convert to digital zoom)  The movie option (recording at 720p) is good but the zoom is even-more limited as this is a camera and not a camcorder.  The camera has numerous picture options and the lens is very good.  Again, great deal for the money and shipping was a breeze.  I saved over $30 from other websites.  Thank you Amazon and DBRoth!

Reviews.Title: Image Stabilization: FAIL
Reviews.Author: Jass "Jass"
Reviews.Content: The Image Stabilization, or perhaps better put the lack of Image Stabilization makes this camera unusable. In full daylight one out of every 4 pictures taken without zoom is usable.

Reviews.Title: save your money
Reviews.Author: Miky3030 "MIKY"
Reviews.Content: I heard a lot about Nikon and how good they are, but i was very disappointed with this one,the  images are very blurry no matter what settings you choose, i tried different setting with no result.  the shutter is always too slow,i think it is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Blurry Blurry!
Reviews.Author: Mark Watney
Reviews.Content: Poor image stabilization compared with much smaller cameras. Even on 2-5X, the image was always slightly blurry. Tried out the same zoom distance on a few other compacts, and got much clearer results. I'm afraid I'll have to return this one.

Reviews.Title: don't buy it
Reviews.Author: C MO
Reviews.Content: My old Canon powershot gave out the day my daugher was born. Needing a camera quickly I purchased this one from a big box store without looking at any reviews or trying it out, I just figured being a Nikon it would take good pictures. This camera is horrible in low light. If you're like me and have kids don't buy it. Most events for kids like birthday parties, birth, etc. happen in low light settings. The pictures will be blurry and the color will not be right. I sent the camera into Nikon and they replaced the lens and multiple other things which did nothing but leave me without a camera for a couple of weeks. I'm not kidding when I say that my IPhone 3GS takes much better pictures in low light than this camera. If you are still interested in buying one of these let me know, I'll give you a great deal on mine because I'm going to buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Robyn Hood
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera, and I definitely made the right choice.  I wanted a point and shoot that was good quality, but wouldn't break the bank.  What I've found is that the L110 is excellent quality for it's price range!  If you've ever owned a digital camera, then you're pretty much ready to start taking pictures once you pop the batteries in the camera.  The Easy Auto mode makes taking pictures really easy.  Just point and shoot!I am really pleased with the image quality.  My pictures are clear and sharp.  I've even taken some pictures indoors without the flash, and they came out great!  The room was well-lit, so I didn't get any yellow shots that some others have complained about.  The macro mode works really well if you're into macro photography.  I took some test shots with the lens almost touching the objects, and the detail of the pictures was amazing.I haven't used the Sport Continuous mode yet, so I can't vouch for that particular feature.  I am in agreement with those who suggest using a tripod when the zoom is fully extended.  I only got one clear picture out of five when testing the zoom.  Here's where having a viewfinder would come in handy, but it's not a big enough problem to make me change my mind about the camera.The lcd is bright and sharp, and you can adjust the brightness.  The camera itself is surprisingly lightweight, and I like the way it feels in my hands.  If you're looking for a high quality, digital camera in this price range, you should definitely consider the L110.

Reviews.Title: COOL PICS INDEAD
Reviews.Author: ajg1874
Reviews.Content: If your looking for value for money look no further, I saw the same camera in a store for 50 bucks more!!! aside from that it really is a very good camera both for pictures and video quality and not to bulky either.Very nice.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Good Price
Reviews.Author: Ulises
Reviews.Content: i Bought this camara to my wife and this present surprise her. The pictures have great quality. Good for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nilon Coolpix.
Reviews.Author: Huey P. O'neal
Reviews.Content: Received camera on timel. Have been very pleased with it. Haven't mastered all features but it just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas Devries "bigdoug"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera great photos..very easy to use.just change the settings for how you use the camera to get great shots

Reviews.Title: A complete dissapointment
Reviews.Author: J. Carvajal "jay105"
Reviews.Content: I decided to give this camera a try after all the positive reviews I have seen not only in Amazon, but CNET,Simon, etc. I did a lot of research. I wanted to buy a SLR camera but at the same time I did not want to break the bank.The camera came and just out of the box and could not take a decent picture. Images came grainy and blurry. I asked in here several times about shutter lag. Some of the other users do not seem to experience any problems with it. I took some pictures of my very active two year old. The only thing that I got was ghostly images of a kid running away completely out of focus.So I learn my lesson there is not short cuts I will spend the extra $300-$400 for an entry level SLR instead. I took the camera to best buy two days after the purchase. Maybe I got a bad one because my experience does not correlate with all the great reviews that I have seen from previous owners.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: dfins
Reviews.Content: For a Nikon, we were very dissappointed!!! Every negative thing you have read about this camera is TRUE. It takes terrible indoor and sport shots, the zoom is fast but pictures are very distorted. You would need a tripod to use the zoom and then I wouldn't expect much. You would be better off with a nice pocket camera and get better pictures  than this heavy, SLS look alike! You will look cool taken the shots, just don't show them!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awful camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Anderson "pirate mom"
Reviews.Content: I have had a few cameras.. and this is by far the worst!  The image quality it terrible if there is any movement at all in the shot.  There is a lot of yellow color in the picture.  I have tried repeatedly to work with this camera, thinking it was just me learning a new camera,, but it has been no use.  I will be returning this camera!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: ms
Reviews.Content: excellentNikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration...Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration...

Reviews.Title: Picture quality HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I purchased my camera about 3 years ago.  I have contacted Nikon at least 3 times since then.  The camera takes horrible BLURY pictures or grainy pictures.  All Nikon has said is send us a picture then they tell me how to restore my camera to original settings.  This camera is a total waste of money!  If you get 1 out of 10 great pictures youre having a good day!  I would NOT recommend this product to anyone! Nor would I recommend Nikon's customer service, they will do nothing to help you!

Reviews.Title: Needs Improving
Reviews.Author: Scotty
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to get a new Nikon, but found a couple of challenges with this model.  In particular, some of my photos did not come out with the clarity that I am use to a Nikon presenting.  I also found this model to be a bit heavy and did not make for easy transport.  I am a huge Nikon fan and will not give up, but this model is my least favorite.

Reviews.Title: incomplete delivery
Reviews.Author: anil
Reviews.Content: the offer was camera with 4 GB card. camera came at very high speed,excellent packing.only problem is that it did not come with 4 GB card as was advertised.photos and video quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: sadan
Reviews.Content: Wanted a simple point and shoot with mega zoom. Its mega zoom alright but miserable as point and shoot because of poor image quality. Not much manual control either. Very beautiful to look at and very light for its size. Poor image quality makes it a bad purchase. I have to dispose it off and purchase another camera.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: ZiggyB "ZiggyB"
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolute garbage. On top of that Nikon service is terrible. I mailed it back because it wasn't working and they said they would fix it. I received the package back in the mail after they told me it would be fixed and they sent it back with a note saying unfixable.  Amazon was great however and sent me a new one. The camera takes lousy pictures though. Wish I bought a Canon.

Reviews.Title: L110 12.1MP
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I didnt buy it from Amazon.com. I havent really put it to real use, just been messing around with it. I'm not impressed. And i've never had an issue with Nikon before. It might just be that i've been using it in the house with bad lighting. But if you are thinking about buying this camera, really shop around and read reviews before making your purchase.------I ended up having a lot of problems with this camera. After 6 months my pictures started turning out funny(grainy, blurry around the edges). I had it set out to be fixed many times just for more problems to occur. At the very end it was only focusing in the middle and nowhere else.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: H.Bahar Vzcan
Reviews.Content: I have just bought Nikon L 110. It is a great camera.Especially in a macro mode.I like it and recomend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: not  worth  the  money
Reviews.Author: soccermom555
Reviews.Content: Bought  this  camera  because  it's a Nikon  and  expected  it  to  live up  to  the name... it  did NOT.  The flash bulb blew out  after 4  months and  they  do  not sell  replacements. Also,  the  camera  does  not  take good shots at sporting  events/ kids even  though  it  clearly  stated  that  it  would.  My  friend has a $90 Kodak  Easyshare  and  that  takes  better  pictures....ridiculous. I  will  never  buy a Nikon  product  again.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Hal Bakal "ias1"
Reviews.Content: Just about the BEST PURCHASE I have EVER made. The CAMERS IS GREAT AND AS ALWAYS THE SELLER IS FANTASTIC

Reviews.Title: NikonCoolpix L110
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!  The red is gorgeous like a new car.Camera takes great  pix...... delivery was fast.I'm thrilled

Reviews.Title: DOES IT HAVE PANORAMIC?
Reviews.Author: Kevin H. Galligan "Kevin Galligan"
Reviews.Content: I am wondering if this cmaera the Nikon Coolpix L110 has panoramic settings on it to take panoramic pictures because I looked on the Best Buy website and that website tells me the this camera has panoramic assist I am wondering what is panoramic assist does that mean this camera has panoramic settings and I can take panoramic pictures what does that mean because I just got another digital camera for my birthday and it has panoramic picture taking but I don't know if I want to keep the camera or not because it dosen't have an eye pice and a neck strap and is twice as small as this camera but I love the features on the camera I just got and I love panoramic I hope this has panoramic and again what does panoramic assist mean does that mean that this camera takes panoramic photos please help me.?

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Aline Frias
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with Nikon. I bought this camera on April, 21 and I used it for about one month and suddenly it has broken. It didn't turn on and off. I used it for just three times and nothing happened, for example the camera dind't fall or something else like that!! I sent it to be repaired in authorized assintance in Brazil and they told me that the camera principal circuit was broken and it will cost more than the camera price (2 times more expensive). I live in Brazil and a friend of mine brought it to me from USA. The camera will be sent to USA as soon as possible to be repaired, but I will never buy a Nikon again. It was not a good experience and it has been a big trouble and wasted time and money. And I think that it is a big problem to a new camera that was used for just few times.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: This camera is possibly the worst camera I have ever used.  I desperately needed to get an upgrade from my 5 yr old Sony with 4 megapixels so I researched quite a bit about this camera and thought it would be a wise decision without having to buy a digital slr.  Not a wise decision at all!!  I have been so frustrated at how every picture I have taken is blurry.  I even took it on a trip at which point the camera decided to stop all together.  After letting it sit for a couple of months, I decided to try it again.  It would take a picture but still blurry.  No matter what setting I have it on, blurry pictures!!  The menus are awful to navigate through.  Preview mode doesn't stay on when trying to look through pictures.  Just moving the camera takes it out of preview.  I'm definitely looking into a slr now but probably won't even stick with the Nikon series at all.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera.
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after reading reviews upon reviews of it. I read all the negative ones thinking "How bad could it really be? I'm sure its user error." Well as it turns out it is not. This camera was awful. After 3 days of owning it, hundreds of pictures and about a 3% success rate on getting the shot I was looking for I sent is back for a refund. The camera will not focus in zoom, I dont care who you are or what your taking a photo of it isn't going to happen, the camera will not focus with the macro lens on and the camera close to the subject of the photo. Camera performs horrible in low light conditions as well as any moving show you could want to take. It just did not hold up to the nikon name. Don't buy it. I ended up paying the extra money for a bridge camera, a canon sx30is, this is a camera that I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Aline Frias
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with Nikon. I bought this camera on April, 21 and I used it for about one month and suddenly it has broken. I used it for just three times and nothing happened, for example the camera dind't fall or something else like that!! I sent it to be repaired in authorized assintance in Brazil and they told me that the camera principal circuit was broken and it will cost more than the camera price (2 times more expensive). I live in Brazil and a friend of mine brought it to me. The camera will be sent to USA as soon as possible to be repaired, but I will never buy a Nikon again. It was not a good experience and it has been a big trouble and a wasted time and money.

Reviews.Title: Too many batteries and out of focus pictures,blurred shots
Reviews.Author: Rene Serrano "SG Ultrafan"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not environmentally friendly if you don't buy rechargable batteries you will become a polluter,it uses too many batteries and useful life of regular batteries is short.I should have been more careful at the moment of selecting and purchasing this camera. Finally this camera takes awful pictures focus on the center of the frame and blurred all around the center of focus. The 15X optical zoom wide could be the cause of the problem.

Reviews.Title: Defective item and got my money back quick!
Reviews.Author: Chenny18
Reviews.Content: My camera was defective and I had to send it back. I sent it back 5 days after the arrival and got my money back in less then  a week. I'm very satisfied with that issue.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Crunk Panda "Crunk Panda™"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera, takes a wide variety of pictures. The only real limitation is your imagination. Want to take an outdoor picture? Go outdoors and hit the button. Similar procedures for indoor pictures. Can also take videos which means potentially you can use this to make money or gain fame. Once videos are made you can easily send these off to America's Funniest Home Videos or Tosh.0. I guess you could go on youtube as well or other internets. The pictures can also be uploaded to facebook and then people can comment on them. All from one camera.If you were to travel back in time with this camera people would be amazed, however you wouldn't be able to do anything with the pictures but look at them on your camera as computers may not have yet been invented.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: B. Poole "bradiane777"
Reviews.Content: I posted a comment on someone else's review but thought I needed to add my rating as well. I have a Kodak digital camera that cost less than $100 and I get better pictures with it - not to mention that I can pick it up, turn it on and take the picture. I don't have to worry about going through a menu, pulling up the flash and all that to get a good picture. Nearly all of the pictures I have taken inside are blurry and every one of the pictures that I took using the zoom lens are extremely blurry - just have to be dumped. I frequently need cute pictures on the spur of the moment and by the time this camera is ready, the moment is over. I also have not been able to get the movies I took to play back on the computer. You would also think that my living room was as long as a football stadium because everyone is so far away in the picture. Maybe after I read this 300 page booklet, I will know how to make this thing work better but I will never be satisfied with having to scroll through a menu (baby has already moved) or raising the flash. I can't believe that I like the cheap Kodak better! (Guess I could have made this a video review but no one would ever see it using this camera).

Reviews.Title: Horrible, it look green
Reviews.Author: Photographer
Reviews.Content: I love Nikon for professional DSLR camera's I own a D300 and love it great quality.However our yearbook staff just had this camera donated.  1. horrible quality (looks green)  2. you can not easily access basic controls without going all the way thru several menusIn closing if you don't have much money go buy a Kodak camera for $99.00 so much better quality same size.

Reviews.Title: Don't Bother with this garbage
Reviews.Author: B. LaBarre "Bolyla"
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of different cameras, film and digital and I have to say this Nikon was the biggest disappointment of all the cameras I have owned.  The focus was lousy, the vibration control hardly worked.  It did awlful in low light.  The controls were poorly arranged and the manual(book) was overly redundant.  I let my wife try it out for a week and she was very disappointed in it too.  I plan to return this and either acquire an Canon or a less expensive Fuji which I know works better than this piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: My review on the Nikon Coolpix L110
Reviews.Author: sHiNbOiE
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it has different from what i thought it was going to be.overall its a great point and shoot camera. worth the money. just know that you get what you pay forThe only things that didn't really work out for me was that it doesn't come with a built in battery, orit takes four AA batteries. In order to upload pictures to your computer you must have battery life in thecamera, that really annoyed me for a while. but other then those problems. its a great point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: lousy
Reviews.Author: mac fan "mac fan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son's wedding pictures.  All the pictures are blurried, even though it has a vibration reduction gadget.  All nigth pictures are yellow.It is a big, not easy to use. It ruined the moment.I cannot return it since I threw away the box as we where travelling abroad for the ocassion.I am very dissapointed and will never buy anything electronic online again!

Reviews.Title: One BIG HASSLE!!!! with NO COOPERATION FROM AMAZON WHAT-SO-EVER!!!!
Reviews.Author: PA Consumer
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon Coolpix through AMAZON over a month ago from "TECH FOR LESS" dot com.  What I actually received was a totally different Olympus Camera worth half the value of the NIKON.  I contacted TECH FOR LESS, and was sent a return label to send this mistaken shipment back.  Tech For Less has acknowledged receipt of the return shipment.  However the problem seems to be with AMAZON.COM and their billing/returns department. Amazon tells us that the credit has been sent to our credit card company (DISCOVER).  However in many calls to DISCOVER they tell us that AMAZON.COM has not been cooperative in any way in establishing this credit back to our account.  I would be totally wary of ordering anything further from AMAZON.COM.  Apparently they are having some internal problems.  We are very disappointed with AMAZON.COM, since we have purchased many, many items over the past ten years through AMAZON.  Apparently the economy is affecting AMAZON as well.  BUYER BE WARE!!!!

Reviews.Title: A BIG, Shiny, Mistake.
Reviews.Author: Crystal D.
Reviews.Content: I love taking pictures but my old camera, GE E1030 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Silver) , had gotten old for me, I'd wanted something new. I went on amazon and found this camera, the Nikon COOLPIX L110, The reviewers loved it, the costumer images looked pretty good so I got it thinking it'd be awesome. Unfortunately it wasn't so. The image quality was horrible and to my dismay the camera didn't have a manual mode. Seeing as every normal camera basically has a manual mode I'd forgot to check for it before I'd bought it. The shutter speed was too slow, the pictures too blurred, overexposed, not properly focused, and had too much static. The HD video was so bad our HD TV didn't even want to connect to replay the video for a second time. Now, don't get me wrong, I know what I'm taking about and this camera is not a camera in my view because my Black Berry takes better photos! About the only thing this camera is good for is sitting on a self to look pretty, this camera is shiny when new and reflects the light nicely back at you.All in all, I do NOT recommend this camera unless you don't mind crappy pictures. Try a GE or Panasonic instead, maybe a FujiFilm if you're desperate.

Reviews.Title: 1 Star for the company, not the product
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I ordered mine through Amazon and with tigerdirect as the seller. It never came. When I sent an email about where it's at, I just get a confirmation that they gave me a REFUND FOR IT. This is 3 days before Christmas. Absolutely will never use tigerdirect again. This is rediculous and I wouldn't suggest them at all.

Reviews.Title: not too sure
Reviews.Author: M. Williams
Reviews.Content: I received this camera a few days ago anticipating a big surprise party for my in-laws. Every picture I took of the surprise turned out terrible!!! The flash didn't work at all even when I raised it so every picture looks like a ghost picture. I'm thinking I may have to send it back, and that's a shame because I waited a long time for it to be released!

Reviews.Title: Grainy indoor photos
Reviews.Author: Mr. Praveen Kariyanahalli
Reviews.Content: Very poor quality indoor photos, extremely grainy. I am a big fan of Nikon, hence got this for my wife. Cannot put this in point-and-shoot category. Optical zoom is a joke. I returned this the same day.

Reviews.Title: returning before trying
Reviews.Author: Jeff "jf"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this but i think im going to refuse it..the written reviews look sweet but after watching vids on youtube of its performance of slow zoom and blurry focus think i will go for a cannon instead..its a shame though really looked like a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Surprise
Reviews.Author: jet
Reviews.Content: Purchased what I assumed was a 2010 model but...SURPRISE! From what I can find it was a 2009 or maybe a 2008 model. Had I known this I would not have purchased the unit. Lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: Waste of money. Stay away *** Honest & Best review for the camera ***
Reviews.Author: A. Govindan
Reviews.Content: I approve all negative reviews about this product. Stay away from this camera. Hottest camera sold in this thanks giving why? Lots of left overs in the warehouse because of its quality.Pros----Battery Life is very goodVideo quality is very good for a digital camera.Cons----Everything else.For night and indoor locations this camera is total waste. Yellow and blurry picture. Even outdoor have to be very careful to avoid shake and blurred picture. Whatever be the mode, the subject should be still to get a good picture. Not good for a moving subject lie kids.People say it is somewhere between point and shoot and SLR. Trust me, it is neither PS nor SLR. Stay away from this. You get lot of good cameras cheaper and better than this. This is my first Nikon camera, i will never come back Nikon, i will stay with Canon.If you have $200, give it to charity than buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not As Good As It Looks
Reviews.Author: Encarnacion
Reviews.Content: I was looking to buy a new camera since i gave mine away. I decided to buy this one because it appeared to me as a good deal $280(including tax) Big mistake, this camera is good only to take pictures of landscapes. I decided to change my camera exactly because it didn't took great pictures inside my house and in low light. Well so didn't this one. It doesn't worth the money you pay for it. It is just OVERRATED.Well, the only thing that is cool about this camera is the 15x optical zoom. But I won't pay $280 just for the Zoom!!!!You can do much better with the money.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L110 12.1MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red)
Reviews.Author: Cedimeg "Cedimeg"
Reviews.Content: Buy this camera especially for 199.00 usd add it to my car and after they said to me that not have and that should wait for an e-mail saying that already they were going to send the camera, already it is today 5 and I have not received anything, the service of this company was so bad, it seems as a form or technology of sales in order that I spend 60.00 USD bonus that is the current price 259.95 USD.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Y. Jones
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera originally to replace my older Canon. I have to say 90% of my photos come out blurry no matter which setting I use. The video comes out grainy. I do not like that fact that there is no manual viewfinder because when the sun is bright it can be hard to see the image in the digital one. Also where the playback button is located it is too easily bumped when trying to take a picture. I have only had this camera for about 4 months but I can't take it anymore and am looking to replace it.
